import React, { useState } from 'react'; import logo from './../../images/logo.png'; import './CompanyRegister.css' import {Button, Col, Container, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Modal, ModalHeader,ModalBody,ModalFooter} from 'reactstrap' function CompanyRegister(props){ const { className } = props; const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); const [data, setData] = useState(''); function getData(event){ setData(event.target.value) } return (
Company Register/Editing
Confirm Information
{data}
); } export default CompanyRegister;
